snippet: Mitt Romney - newly professed fan of the iPhone, Snooki and sleeping in "as little as possible" - offered a lighthearted, humanizing glimpse of himself Friday morning in an interview with Kelly Ripa and Michael Strahan, set to air Tuesday.
abstract: Mitt Romney - newly professed fan of the iPhone, Snooki and sleeping in "as little as possible" - offered a lighthearted, humanizing glimpse of himself Friday morning in an interview with Kelly Ripa and Michael Strahan, set to air Tuesday.

headline.main: The Romneys Tape Appearance on 'Live With Kelly and Michael'
